title.rendered: Insulated Gate Bipolar Transistor (IGBT) Market is estimated to cross US$ 14.9 Billion at a CAGR of 8.3% during forecast period 2023 to 2033

content.rendered:
The market value of insulated gate bipolar transistors (IGBT) in the United Kingdom is predicted to increase by 8.1% CAGR and reach US$ 522.2 Million during the forecast period. The region’s market development is attributable to increased sales of electric and hybrid vehicles, as well as the growing trend of electrification and rising gasoline prices in the United Kingdom.

/EIN News/ — NEWARK, Del, May 09, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — The global insulated gate bipolar transistor market size is likely to be valued at US$ 6.7 Billion in 2023. The increasing application of technologically improved insulated gate bipolar transistors across various industries is driving market growth. The market is estimated to garner US$ 14.9 Billion in 2033, recording a CAGR of 8.3% from 2023 to 2033.

The global insulated gate bipolar transistor market is expected to continue growing during the forecast period driven by increasing demand from industrial manufacturing and consumer electronics.

One of the factors propelling the growth of the insulated gate bipolar transistor market includes increasing demand for metal oxide semiconductor field effect transistor (MOSFET) alternatives with higher compatibility with voltage and current.

Insulated Gate Bipolar Transistor (IGBT) gaining popularity in consumer electronics due to its ability to lower switching loss and decrease thermal stress on electric appliances. The insulated gate bipolar transistors are used in microwave, stereo systems, and variable-speed refrigerators, and are expected to drive the growth of the market during the forecast period

Find a report summary that describes the market size and forecast. The Sample report is Available in PDF format @
https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-477

Growing investments in electrification in Europe and North America are likely to boost the demand for insulated gate bipolar transistors. The increasing technological advances in the automotive industry and increased sales of electronic vehicles in emerging economies such as India and China are expected to drive the insulated gate bipolar transistor market growth during the forecast period.

Increasing applications in the wind and solar power industry have created opportunities for market growth. The rising demand for renewable power sources is expected to drive the growth of the market during the forecast period.

Key Takeaways:

  • Based on the power rating, the high power segment accounts for a CAGR of 8.6 %.
  • By type, the IGBT module segment is expected to expand at a CAGR of 8.9% during the forecast period.
  • North America to emerge as a promising market, capturing a CAGR of 8.3%.
  • Asia Pacific is an opportunistic market, expected to capture a CAGR of 8.0% during the forecast period.  

“Growing demand in the end-use industry and technological innovation in insulated gate bipolar transistors are expected to drive the market in the forecast period. The increasing demand for the automotive industry and rising sales of electric vehicles globally is projected to play a vital role in strengthening the market,” suggests an analyst at FMI.

Competitive Landscape:

Prominent players in the insulated gate bipolar transistor market are Infineon Technologies AG; NXP Semiconductors NV; Microchip Technology, Inc.; Microsemi Corporation; Fuji Electric Co., Ltd. among others. Some of the recent development in the market are listed below.

  • In October 2020 – Microchip Technology Inc. announced the acquisition of Tekron International Limited, a global leader in providing high-precision GPS and atomic clock time-keeping technologies and solutions for the smart grid and other industrial applications.
  • In June 2021 – NXP Semiconductors N.V. a world leader in automotive processing, and TSMC announced the release of NXP’s S32G2 vehicle network processors and the S32R294 radar processor into volume production on TSMC’s advanced 16 nanometers (nm) FinFET process technology.

To understand opportunities in the Insulated Gate Bipolar Transistor (IGBT) market, the market is segmented based on the type, power rating, and application across five major regions.

Explore FMI’s Extensive Coverage on Industrial Automation Domain:

Process Liquid Analyzer Market Demand: The global process liquid analyzer market is estimated to be worth around US$ 2,861.9 Million in 2023. The overall demand is anticipated to rise at a healthy CAGR of 5.5% between 2023 and 2033, totaling a valuation of over US$ 4,888.5 Million by 2033.

Australia Concrete Pump Market Analysis: The Australia concrete pump market is set to reach a valuation of US$ 208.4 Million in 2023, and is likely to surpass a CAGR of 6.0% between 2023 and 2033. In 2033, the global market is predicted to generate revenues upwards of US$ 372.3 Million.

Modular Instruments Market Growth: The global modular instruments market size is likely to be valued at US$ 1.8 Billion in 2023. The market revenue is anticipated to expand at 2.3X and surpass US$ 4.2 Billion by 2033, registering a CAGR of 8.5%.

Sealless Magnetic Drive Pump Market Forecast: Registering a year-on-year (Y-o-Y) growth of 5.3%, the global sealless magnetic drive pump market size reached around US$ 637.7 Million in 2022. Over the next ten years, global sealless magnetic drive pump sales are likely to soar at 6.4% CAGR.

Machine Control System Market Share: The global machine control system market growth is expected to register a healthy CAGR of 6.5% during the assessment period. The market is estimated to be valued at US$ 15,436.8 Million by 2033. In 2023, the market is assessed to generate revenue of US$ 8,223.6 Million.

Shot Blasting Machine Market Revenue: The global shot blasting machine market is predicted to surpass a valuation of US$ 1,202.4 Million in 2023. It is anticipated to hit a valuation of US$ 1,977.2 Million by 2033. The market is estimated to showcase a remarkable CAGR of 5.1% from 2023 to 2033.

Transformer Tap Changers and Voltage Control Relay Market Size: Transformer tap changers and voltage control relay sales are projected to increase at a considerable CAGR of 4.9% during the forecast period. The market is estimated to top a valuation of US$ 2357.1 Million in 2033.

Tritium Light Source Market Value: The global tritium light source market is likely garner a value of US$ 8.6 Billion, recording a CAGR of 2.5% from 2023 to 2033. The market is likely to secure US$ 6.7 Billion in 2023.

USA Scroll Compressor Market Sales: Recent market analysis projects that the demand for scroll compressors in the USA is set to grow at a CAGR of 4.9% for the forecast period 2023 to 2033. It is anticipated to reach a valuation of about US$ 1,703.6 Million by the end of the forecast period.

Robotic Grippers Market Revenue: The robotics gripper market is likely to capture a valuation of US$ 1.7 Billion in 2023 and is predicted to reach US$ 4.3 Billion by 2033. The market is registering a CAGR of 9.4% during the forecast period.
